Name: Summer Days
About the game: Briana has been craving some time off all summer and finally with her shoot wrapped for hiatus she can relax at her summer cottage on the lake. To really enjoy herself she even drags her female co-stars along for the ride. A yuri visual novel story of fun and sun at the lake, with multiple choices and routes to explore. See the girls relax in the lake and maybe do some skinny dipping too. Visual Novel Style Gameplay Multiple Decision to Make Secret Routes to Unlock Beautiful Illustrations * All characters included in the game are at least 18 years of age.
